definition: Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

pinyin: Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4 Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4 yu3

definition: Serbia and Montenegro (after break-up of Yugoslavia in 1992)
pinyin: Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4 he2 Hei1 shan1

sentences.english: Opinions on bombing the Serbs cut across party lines.
sentences.chinese: 关于轰炸塞尔维亚的意见违反了党的路线。

sentences.english: The next day Milosevic and the Serbian parliament agreed to them.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，米洛舍维奇和塞尔维亚议会同意了这些要求。

sentences.english: Slobodan Milosevic of Serbia died in a Dutch prison.
sentences.chinese: 塞尔维亚统治者米洛舍维奇在一所荷兰监狱逝世。

sentences.english: The bombs would inflict great damage on the military and economic infrastructure of Serbia.
sentences.chinese: 炸弹将对塞尔维亚的军事和经济设施造成严重破坏。

sentences.english: Aresa are conducting field trials in Serbia.
sentences.chinese: Aresa正在塞尔维亚进行大田试验。

sentences.english: It is a common refrain in the Serbian enclaves.
sentences.chinese: 在塞尔维亚飞地中这是最常见的说法。

sentences.english: Moreover, many in Kosovo feel that there is a pro-Serb tilt in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 此外，科索沃许多人认为北京有亲塞尔维亚的倾向。

sentences.english: The Serbian government is trumpeting this as a crackdown on organised crime.
sentences.chinese: 塞尔维亚政府称此举旨在制裁有组织的犯罪。

sentences.english: The capture of Mr. Mladic was a condition for Serbia to become a candidate to join the European Union.
sentences.chinese: 抓捕姆拉迪奇是塞尔维亚成为欧盟候选国的条件之一。

sentences.english: The last summit meeting in the Novo Wei Sade 3 years ago, held in Serbia.
sentences.chinese: 上一次领导人会议于3年前在塞尔维亚诺维萨德举行。

sentences.english: As expected, Kosovo's parliament has voted in favour of independence from Serbia.
sentences.chinese: 不出所料，科索沃的议会投票赞成脱离塞尔维亚独立。

sentences.english: Serbia, in contrast, lacks even a fraction of this economic influence over Kosovar Albanians.
sentences.chinese: 相反，塞尔维亚对科索沃的阿族人缺乏经济影响力。

sentences.english: Serbia and Montenegro has an estimated population of 10.8 million.
sentences.chinese: 据估计塞尔维亚和黑山有人口1千80万。

sentences.english: Within a month, Kosovo is expected to unilaterally declare its independence from Serbia.
sentences.chinese: 在一个月内，科索沃将单方面宣布脱离塞尔维亚独立。

sentences.english: And the same evening German motorized elements reached the Serbian frontiers.
sentences.chinese: 同日晚间，德国的摩托化部队进抵塞尔维亚边境。

sentences.english: Qué tal el día después de su hat-trick a Serbia?
sentences.chinese: 在面对塞尔维亚上演帽子戏法之后感觉如何？

definition: abbr. for 波斯尼亞和黑塞哥維那|波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那[Bo1 si1 ni2 ya4 he2 Hei1 sai4 ge1 wei2 na4] Bosnia and Herzegovina
